## Challenge Technical Details
flag: flag{7gtizo2p}
cipher: RSA
ciphertext: 1226438914877761027656147414721480149548044557240086831858554445962655849911741241326168206651875941545093628258911811622719739914366329910988157770130482
vulnerability: blum integers
hint: Blum integers are products of primes congruent to 3 modulo 4. These integers have unique properties in cryptography.
necessary_info: The flag format is flag{...}
n=6828972764266750997935412579454522130294597818372165627635334965090746731122922864659645659196849903940643335348282678746474606288769747891453025739884781, e=2956871534515953070060753509448198944796545584906640923489548265724211789256517203534799277891282544820610084649129590828816791748506509213928838437729061
